g.text: Remittance Transfer using Mojaloop FX APIs POC
Payer DFSP requests conversion with SEND amount
I want to send to MSISDN 2551234567890
Check Sanction list status & trigger a refresh of the status
Check account and get currency type
Yes, it's Yaro. He can receive in TZS
Yes, it's Yaro. He can receive in TZS
Hi, $senderName: The number belongs to Yaro
Let me know if you want to go ahead
Payer has accepted the party information
Hmmm. I can only send in BWP.
I need to get some currency conversion
What FXPs do you know about?
What FXPs do you know about?
What FXPs do you know about?
Here are the available FXPs:FDH FX
I'll ask FDH FX to perform my conversion
I want to get a quote from this FXP
Here is the initial version of the transfer.
Please quote me for the currency conversion.
Here is the initial version of the transfer.
Please quote me for the currency conversion.
I will add a 33 BWP fee for undertaking the conversion.
Now I'll set an expiry time, sign the quotation object,
Now I'll sign the quotation object,
create an ILP prepare packet and return it in the intermediary object.
NOTE: the ILP prepare packet contains the following items, all encoded:
- The amount being sent (i.e. in the source currency)
- The content of the conversion terms
I want to get a quote from the FSP
Please quote for a transfer which sends 48000 TZS.
OK, so I will charge 4000 TZS for this.
Now I create terms of the transfer
Now I will sign the transaction object
<This is encoded transaction object. It contains data from quote request and response.>
OK, I can see that there are going to be 4000 TZS in charges.
Here's the quote for the transfer
<This is encoded transaction object. It contains data from quote request and response.>
Hi, $senderName: I can do the transfer.
It'll cost you 55 BWP(10000 TZS) in fees
Let me know if you want to go ahead
Payer has accepted the terms please proceed
Please confirm your part of the transfer
OK, so this is an FX confirmation.
Is there any transfer with determiningTransactionId?
Liquidity check and reserve on Payer DFSP's account
PayerFSP has a reservation of 300 BWP
Please confirm the currency conversion part of the transfer
Check fulfilment matches and cancel if not.
Conversion succeeded subject to transfer success
Confirmed. You can proceed with the transfer.
Is there a dependent transfer? Yes
Perform liquidity check and reserve funds
against creditor party to dependent transfer
PayerFSP has a reservation of 300 BWP
FDH_FX has a reservation of 48000 TZS
Let me check that the terms of the dependent transfer
are the same as the ones I agreed to
and that the fulfilment and condition match
Please credit Yaro's account with 44000 TZS
Note: fulfilment is optional: SDK will create if not found
Transfer is confirmed, here's the fulfilment
Is this dependency against the debtor party to the transfer?
Create an obligation from the debtor party to the party named in the dependency (the FXP)
Is the transfer denominated in the currency of the payee receive amount?
Create an obligation from the party named in the dependency
to the creditor party for the transfer
You can clear it in your ledgers
Let's just check: does this match the stuff I sent?
It does. Great. I'll clear the conversion
PayerFSP has a debit of 300 BWP
FDH_FX has a credit of 300 BWP
FDH_FX has a debit of 48000 TZS
PayeeFSP has a credit of 48000 TZS
Commit the funds in my ledgers
